title: Eigenweights for arithmetic Hirzebruch Proportionality
summary: Prior work of Feng--Yun--Zhang established a (Higher) Arithmetic Hirzebruch Proportionality Principle, expressing the arithmetic volumes of moduli stacks of shtukas in terms of differential operators applied to $L$-functions. This formula involves certain "eigenweights" which were calculated in simple cases by Feng--Yun--Zhang, but not in general. We document work of a (custom) AI Agent built upon Gemini Deep Think, which employs tools from algebraic combinatorics to connect these eigenweights to the representation theory of symmetric groups, and then determines them for all classical groups.

AI.tldr: 本文利用AI代理结合代数组合学方法，将算术Hirzebruch比例原理中的特征权重与对称群表示论联系起来，并计算了所有经典群的特征权重。
AI.motivation: Feng-Yun-Zhang先前建立的算术Hirzebruch比例原理将模叠的算术体积用L函数的微分算子表示，但其中的"特征权重"只在简单情况下被计算，缺乏一般性结果。
AI.method: 构建基于Gemini Deep Think的定制AI代理，运用代数组合学工具，将特征权重与对称群表示论建立联系，然后计算所有经典群的特征权重。
AI.result: 成功确定了所有经典群的特征权重，解决了先前工作中未完成的一般性计算问题。
AI.conclusion: 通过AI代理结合代数组合学方法，成功将算术Hirzebruch比例原理中的特征权重与对称群表示论联系起来，并完成了所有经典群特征权重的计算，扩展了先前工作的适用范围。

title: Vector-valued Gelfand-Kazhdan criterion
summary: The Gelfand-Kazhdan criterion is a fundamental tool for studying multiplicity-one properties of local periods of representations. However, it does not apply to many cases arising in the relative Langlands program. Generalizing the usual Gelfand-Kazhdan criterion, we formulate and prove a vector-valued Gelfand-Kazhdan criterion that fits into the general framework of the relative Langlands program. As an illustration of its effectiveness, we establish the multiplicity-one property for the local Asai Rankin-Selberg periods.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了经典的Gelfand-Kazhdan准则，提出了向量值版本的Gelfand-Kazhdan准则，适用于相对Langlands纲领中的更多情况，并以此证明了局部Asai Rankin-Selberg周期的重数一性质。
AI.motivation: 经典的Gelfand-Kazhdan准则在研究局部周期表示的重数一性质时是基本工具，但在相对Langlands纲领中的许多情况下不适用。需要推广该准则以适应更广泛的应用场景。
AI.method: 作者将通常的Gelfand-Kazhdan准则推广到向量值版本，使其能够融入相对Langlands纲领的一般框架。通过构建向量值的Gelfand-Kazhdan准则，为相对Langlands纲领中的周期问题提供了新的分析工具。
AI.result: 成功证明并建立了向量值Gelfand-Kazhdan准则，并应用该准则证明了局部Asai Rankin-Selberg周期具有重数一性质，展示了新方法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 向量值Gelfand-Kazhdan准则为相对Langlands纲领中的周期问题提供了强有力的分析工具，能够处理经典方法无法覆盖的情况，具有重要的理论和应用价值。

title: Noetherianity for powers of algebraic representations
summary: Powers of a polynomial $\operatorname{GL}$-representation are topologically Noetherian under the action of $\operatorname{Sym} \times \operatorname{GL}$. We show that this result extends to powers of algebraic representations of the orthogonal and the symplectic groups. This work is a natural follow-up to arXiv:2212.05790 and to arXiv:1708.06420.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了正交群和辛群代数表示的幂在Sym×GL作用下是拓扑Noetherian的，这是对先前GL-表示结果的推广。
AI.motivation: 先前的研究已经证明了多项式GL-表示在Sym×GL作用下的幂是拓扑Noetherian的。本文旨在将这一结果推广到正交群和辛群的代数表示上，这是对相关理论的自然扩展。
AI.method: 作者通过将正交群和辛群的代数表示纳入研究框架，扩展了先前关于GL-表示的结果。论文是arXiv:2212.05790和arXiv:1708.06420工作的自然延续。
AI.result: 成功证明了正交群和辛群代数表示的幂在Sym×GL作用下也是拓扑Noetherian的，从而将GL-表示的结果推广到了更广泛的李群表示范畴。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了代数表示理论中的Noetherian性质，为正交群和辛群表示的研究提供了新的拓扑工具，深化了对李群表示结构的理解。

title: Graded Lie superalgebras from embedding tensors
summary: We show how various constructions of $\mathbb{Z}$-graded Lie superalgebras are related to each other. These Lie superalgebras have a Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$ as the subalgebra at degree 0, an odd $\mathfrak{g}$-module V as the subspace at degree 1, and an embedding tensor as an element at degree -1. This is a linear map from V to $\mathfrak{g}$ satisfying a quadratic constraint, which equips V with the structure of a Leibniz algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了多种Z-分级李超代数的构造方法之间的相互关系
AI.motivation: 研究不同构造方法之间的关系，以更好地理解具有特定分级结构的李超代数
AI.method: 分析Z-分级李超代数的构造，其中0次子代数为李代数g，1次子空间为奇g-模V，-1次元素为嵌入张量
AI.result: 展示了各种构造方法之间的相互联系，嵌入张量作为从V到g的线性映射满足二次约束，赋予V莱布尼兹代数结构
AI.conclusion: 不同构造方法之间存在系统性的联系，这些联系揭示了Z-分级李超代数的内在结构关系

title: Poset modules of the $0$-Hecke algebras of type $B$
summary: In 2001, Chow developed the theory of the $B_n$ posets $P$ and the type $B$ $P$-partition enumerators $K^B_P$. To provide a representation-theoretic interpretation of $K^B_P$, we define the poset modules $M^B_P$ of the 0-Hecke algebra $H_n^B(0)$ of type $B$ by endowing the set of type-$B$ linear extensions of $P$ with an $H_n^B(0)$-action. We then show that the Grothendieck group of the category associated to type-$B$ poset modules is isomorphic to the space of type $B$ quasisymmetric functions as both a $\mathrm{QSym}$-module and comodule, where $\mathrm{QSym}$ denotes the Hopf algebra of quasisymmetric functions. Considering an equivalence relation on $B_n$ posets, where two posets are equivalent if they share the same set of type-$B$ linear extensions, we identify a natural representative of each equivalence class, which we call a distinguished poset. We further characterize the distinguished posets whose sets of type-$B$ linear extensions form intervals in the right weak Bruhat order on the the hyperoctahedral groups. Finally, we discuss the relationship among the categories associated to type-$B$ weak Bruhat interval modules, $B_n$ poset modules, and finite-dimensional $H_n^B(0)$-modules.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Chow的B_n偏序集理论与0-Hecke代数表示论联系起来，通过定义B型偏序集模，建立了B型拟对称函数与Grothendieck群之间的同构关系，并研究了B_n偏序集的等价类及其在超八面体群弱Bruhat序中的结构。
AI.motivation: 为Chow的B_n偏序集理论和B型P-分割枚举子K^B_P提供表示论解释，将组合对象与代数结构联系起来，深化对B型拟对称函数和0-Hecke代数表示的理解。
AI.method: 1. 定义B型偏序集模M^B_P，通过在B型线性扩展集合上赋予H_n^B(0)-作用；2. 证明相关范畴的Grothendieck群与B型拟对称函数空间同构；3. 引入B_n偏序集的等价关系，定义distinguished poset作为等价类代表；4. 刻画在超八面体群弱Bruhat序中形成区间的distinguished posets；5. 分析B型弱Bruhat区间模、B_n偏序集模和有限维H_n^B(0)-模范畴之间的关系。
AI.result: 1. 建立了B型偏序集模的表示论框架；2. 证明了Grothendieck群与B型拟对称函数空间的同构关系；3. 识别了B_n偏序集等价类的自然代表(distinguished posets)；4. 刻画了在弱Bruhat序中形成区间的distinguished posets的特征；5. 揭示了不同类型模范畴之间的结构关系。
AI.conclusion: 该工作成功地将Chow的B_n偏序集组合理论嵌入到0-Hecke代数的表示论框架中，建立了组合对象与代数结构之间的深刻联系，为B型拟对称函数和超八面体群表示理论提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Relative Kazhdan Lusztig isomorphism for $GL_{2n}/Sp_{2n}$
summary: The Kazhdan Lusztig isomorphism, relating the affine Hecke algebra of a $p$-adic group to the equivariant $K$ theory of the Steinberg variety of its Langlands dual, played a key role in the proof of the Deligne Langlands conjectures concerning the classification of smooth irreducible representations with an Iwahori fixed vector. In this work we state and prove a relative version of the Kazhdan Lusztig isomorphism for the symmetric pair $(GL_{2n},Sp_{2n})$. The relative isomorphism is an isomorphism between the module of compactly supported Iwahori invariant functions on $X=GL_{2n}/Sp_{2n}$ and another module over the affine Hecke algebra constructed using equivariant $K$ theory and the relative Langlands duality. We use this isomorphism to give a new proof of a condition on $X$ distinguished representations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了GL_{2n}/Sp_{2n}对称对的Kazhdan-Lusztig同构相对版本，建立了仿射Hecke代数上两个模之间的同构关系，并用于证明X可区分表示的条件。
AI.motivation: 经典的Kazhdan-Lusztig同构在证明Deligne-Langlands猜想中发挥了关键作用，该猜想涉及具有Iwahori固定向量的光滑不可约表示的分类。本文旨在为对称对(GL_{2n},Sp_{2n})建立相对版本的Kazhdan-Lusztig同构。
AI.method: 构建了仿射Hecke代数上的两个模之间的同构：一个是在X=GL_{2n}/Sp_{2n}上具有紧支集的Iwahori不变函数模，另一个是利用等变K理论和相对Langlands对偶性构造的模。
AI.result: 成功证明了对对称对(GL_{2n},Sp_{2n})的相对Kazhdan-Lusztig同构定理，建立了上述两个模之间的同构关系。
AI.conclusion: 利用这个相对同构，给出了X可区分表示条件的新证明，扩展了经典Kazhdan-Lusztig同构在相对设置中的应用。

title: Multisets of finite intervals and a universal category of poset representations
summary: For any finite totally ordered set, the multisets of intervals form an abelian category. Various classes of subcategories admit natural combinatorial descriptions, and counting them yields familiar integer sequences. Surprisingly, in some cases new integer sequences arise. The formulation of this counting problem leads to a universal construction which assigns to any poset a finitely cocomplete additive category; it is abelian when the poset is finite and does not depend on the choice of any ring of coefficients. For a general poset the universal category of representations is abelian if and only if for the lattice of ideals the meet of two compact elements is again compact.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究有限全序集的区间多重集形成的阿贝尔范畴，发现其子范畴计数产生熟悉或新的整数序列，并构建了从任意偏序集到有限余完备加性范畴的通用构造。
AI.motivation: 研究有限全序集的区间多重集形成的范畴结构，探索其子范畴的计数问题，以及如何将这种构造推广到更一般的偏序集上。
AI.method: 通过范畴论方法，分析有限全序集的区间多重集形成的阿贝尔范畴，研究其子范畴的分类和计数，并构建从任意偏序集到有限余完备加性范畴的通用构造。
AI.result: 发现有限全序集的区间多重集范畴的子范畴计数产生熟悉或新的整数序列；构建了通用构造将任意偏序集映射到有限余完备加性范畴；确定了表示范畴为阿贝尔范畴的充要条件。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了偏序集与范畴结构之间的深刻联系，揭示了组合数学与范畴论之间的有趣对应关系，为理解表示理论中的范畴结构提供了新的视角。

title: Smooth correspondences between quiver varieties
summary: We introduce a new class of smooth correspondences between Nakajima quiver varieties called split parabolic quiver varieties, and study their properties. We use these correspondences to construct an explicit resolution of singularities of quiver Brill--Noether loci and prove that the latter are irreducible and Cohen-Macaulay of expected dimension (if non-empty). This generalizes the results of Nakajima--Yoshioka and Bayer--Chen--Jiang for Hilbert schemes of points on surfaces.

AI.tldr: 论文引入了一种新的光滑对应关系——分裂抛物箭图簇，用于解决箭图Brill-Noether轨迹的奇异性，并证明其不可约性和Cohen-Macaulay性质。
AI.motivation: 研究Nakajima箭图簇之间的光滑对应关系，旨在为箭图Brill-Noether轨迹提供显式奇点解消，并推广曲面点Hilbert概形的已有结果。
AI.method: 引入分裂抛物箭图簇作为Nakajima箭图簇之间的新类光滑对应，利用这些对应构造箭图Brill-Noether轨迹的显式奇点解消。
AI.result: 证明了箭图Brill-Noether轨迹（若非空）是不可约的、Cohen-Macaulay的，且具有预期维数，推广了Nakajima-Yoshioka和Bayer-Chen-Jiang关于曲面点Hilbert概形的结果。
AI.conclusion: 分裂抛物箭图簇为研究箭图Brill-Noether轨迹的几何性质提供了有效工具，成功推广了曲面点Hilbert概形的相关理论到更一般的箭图簇情形。

title: Zero-level integrable modules over twisted affine Lie superalgebras
summary: The main result of this paper is the characterization of zero-level integrable finite weight modules, over twisted affine Lie superalgebras. We prove that such a module is parabolically induced from a module which is obtained, in a prescribed way, from a module over a Lie algebra $\mathscr{L}$ which is either a $\bbbz$-graded abelian Lie algebra or a direct sum of a $\bbbz$-graded abelian Lie algebra and the so-called quadratic Lie superalgebra $\mathcal{Q}$. We give also a complete characterization of both finite dimensional simple $\mathcal{Q}$-modules as well as bounded finite weight $\bbbz$-graded simple $\mathcal{Q}$-modules.

AI.tldr: 本文主要研究了扭曲仿射李超代数的零级可积有限权模的特征刻画，证明了这类模可以通过特定方式从李代数$\mathscr{L}$的模抛物诱导得到，并完整刻画了$\mathcal{Q}$-模的结构。
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲仿射李超代数的零级可积有限权模的特征刻画，这类模在表示理论中具有重要意义，但尚未有完整的分类结果。
AI.method: 通过抛物诱导方法，将扭曲仿射李超代数的零级可积有限权模与$\mathscr{L}$-模联系起来，其中$\mathscr{L}$是$\mathbb{Z}$-分次阿贝尔李代数或其与二次李超代数$\mathcal{Q}$的直和。
AI.result: 证明了零级可积有限权模可以通过特定方式从$\mathscr{L}$-模抛物诱导得到，并完整刻画了有限维单$\mathcal{Q}$-模和有界有限权$\mathbb{Z}$-分次单$\mathcal{Q}$-模的结构。
AI.conclusion: 本文给出了扭曲仿射李超代数零级可积有限权模的完整特征刻画，为这类重要表示的分类提供了理论基础，同时解决了$\mathcal{Q}$-模的分类问题。

title: Pseudo-Riemannian Spectral Triples for $\mathrm{SU}(1,1)$
summary: We use the harmonic analysis of $\mathrm{SU}(1,1)$ to show that the triple $(\mathcal{A},\mathcal{H},D)$, with $D$ (the closure of) Kostant's cubic Dirac operator acting on the Hilbert space $\mathcal{H}=L^2(\mathrm{SU}(1,1))\otimes\mathbb{C}^2$, and with $*$-algebra $\mathcal{A}=C^\infty_c(\mathrm{SU}(1,1))\otimes 1$, forms both a pseudo-Riemannian spectral triple in the sense of Van den Dungen, Paschke and Rennie, and an indefinite spectral triple in the sense of Van den Dungen and Rennie.

AI.tldr: 该论文使用SU(1,1)的调和分析，证明由Kostant三次Dirac算子和相关代数构成的系统同时满足伪黎曼谱三元组和不定谱三元组的定义。
AI.motivation: 研究SU(1,1)群上的Dirac算子结构，探索其在非紧李群上的谱三元组性质，特别是验证其是否满足伪黎曼和不定谱三元组的数学定义。
AI.method: 运用SU(1,1)的调和分析技术，构造由Kostant三次Dirac算子D、希尔伯特空间H=L²(SU(1,1))⊗ℂ²和*-代数A=C∞_c(SU(1,1))⊗1组成的三元组，并验证其数学性质。
AI.result: 证明该三元组(𝒜,ℋ,D)同时构成Van den Dungen、Paschke和Rennie定义的伪黎曼谱三元组，以及Van den Dungen和Rennie定义的不定谱三元组。
AI.conclusion: SU(1,1)群上的Kostant三次Dirac算子及相关结构为研究非紧李群上的谱几何提供了重要实例，同时满足两种不同的谱三元组定义框架。

title: Explicit Construction of Maass Wave Forms and Their Petersson Inner Products
summary: In this paper, we explicitly construct Maass wave cusp forms associated to Hecke characters on arbitrary real quadratic fields. This result is a generalization of Maass (1949), who constructed Maass wave cusp forms under the assumption that narrow class number is one. We also compute its Petersson inner product explicitly and give a few examples involving dihedral Artin representation.

AI.tldr: 本文显式构造了任意实二次域上Hecke特征标对应的Maass波尖点形式，推广了Maass(1949)在窄类数为1假设下的结果，并显式计算了其Petersson内积，给出了涉及二面体Artin表示的例子。
AI.motivation: Maass(1949)在窄类数为1的假设下构造了Maass波尖点形式，但这一限制条件较强。本文旨在将这一构造推广到任意实二次域，消除窄类数为1的限制，从而获得更一般的Maass波尖点形式构造方法。
AI.method: 采用显式构造方法，基于Hecke特征标在任意实二次域上构造Maass波尖点形式。通过数学推导和计算，建立了相应的构造公式和性质分析。
AI.result: 成功构造了任意实二次域上Hecke特征标对应的Maass波尖点形式，显式计算了其Petersson内积，并给出了涉及二面体Artin表示的具体例子，验证了构造的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 本文推广了Maass(1949)的结果，为任意实二次域上的Maass波尖点形式提供了显式构造方法，并建立了相应的内积计算公式，为相关领域的研究提供了新的工具和实例。

title: Quantum Universality in Composite Systems: A Trichotomy of Clifford Resources
comment: 20 pages. Extended the analysis to include non-Clifford permutations as universal resources for prime and prime-power dimensions
summary: The Clifford group is efficiently classically simulable, and universality is obtained by supplementing it with non-Clifford resources. We determine which single-qudit gates suffice to achieve universality. We show that the structure of such resources is governed by the prime factorization of the qudit dimension $d$. Using the adjoint action on the space of complex trace-zero matrices, we relate density to irreducibility together with an infiniteness criterion, yielding a trichotomy based on the factorization of $d$. When $d$ is prime, any non-Clifford gate generates a dense subgroup of the determinant-one unitaries. If $d$ is a prime power, the adjoint action is reducible, and universality requires gates that couple the resulting invariant subspaces. For composite $d$ with pairwise coprime factors, generalized intra-qudit controlled-NOT gates connecting the factors already suffice. These findings suggest that ``composite architectures'' -- hybrid registers combining incommensurate dimensions -- offer a route to bypass the standard overhead associated with magic-state injection.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了单量子比特门在补充Clifford群时实现通用性的条件，发现这与量子比特维度d的质因数分解结构密切相关。
AI.motivation: Clifford群可以被经典高效模拟，需要通过补充非Clifford资源来实现通用量子计算。研究目标是确定哪些单量子比特门足以实现通用性，并理解这些资源的结构如何受量子比特维度d的质因数分解影响。
AI.method: 使用伴随作用在复迹零矩阵空间上的方法，将密度与不可约性以及无穷性准则联系起来。基于d的因数分解建立三分法：当d为质数时；当d为质数幂时；当d为具有互质因子的合数时。
AI.result:
1. 当d为质数时，任何非Clifford门都能生成行列式为1的酉矩阵的稠密子群。
2. 当d为质数幂时，伴随作用可约，通用性需要耦合所得不变子空间的量子门。
3. 当d为具有互质因子的合数时，连接这些因子的广义intra-qudit受控非门已经足够。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明"复合架构"——结合不相称维度的混合寄存器——提供了一条绕过标准魔术态注入相关开销的途径。量子比特维度d的质因数分解结构决定了实现通用量子计算所需非Clifford资源的具体形式。

title: Relative braid group symmetries on modified iquantum groups and their modules
comment: v2 75 pages, some terminology changes and minor revisions
summary: We present a comprehensive generalization of Lusztig's braid group symmetries for quasi-split iquantum groups. Specifically, we give 3 explicit rank one formulas for symmetries acting on integrable modules over a quasi-split iquantum group of arbitrary Kac-Moody type with general parameters. These symmetries are formulated in terms of idivided powers and iweights of the vectors being acted upon. We show that these symmetries are consistent with the relative braid group symmetries on iquantum groups, and they are also related to Lusztig's symmetries via quasi $K$-matrices. Furthermore, through appropriate rescaling, we obtain compatible symmetries for the integral forms of modified iquantum groups and their integrable modules. We verify that these symmetries satisfy the relative braid group relations.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了Lusztig的辫群对称性到拟分裂i量子群，给出了三个显式的一秩公式，证明了这些对称性与相对辫群对称性的一致性，并通过重新标度得到了修改i量子群积分形式上的兼容对称性。
AI.motivation: 将Lusztig的辫群对称性推广到更一般的拟分裂i量子群，建立适用于任意Kac-Moody类型和一般参数的对称性理论。
AI.method: 使用i除幂和i权向量，给出了三个显式的一秩公式来定义对称性；通过拟K-矩阵与Lusztig对称性建立联系；通过重新标度获得积分形式上的兼容对称性。
AI.result: 证明了这些对称性与相对辫群对称性的一致性，验证了它们满足相对辫群关系，并获得了修改i量子群积分形式上的兼容对称性。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了拟分裂i量子群上Lusztig辫群对称性的全面推广，为更一般的量子群对称性理论提供了基础框架。

title: On some results of Harish-Chandra for representations of p-adic groups, extended to their central extensions
comment: 17 pages, French; minor corrections and two annexes added in this second version
summary: The aim of this article is to give a complete proof of results of Harish-Chandra linking the irreducibility of parabolic induction of a supercuspidal representation of a p-adic group to the analytic behavior of the mu-function of Harish-Chandra and to show that the proof remains valid in the case of a central extension.M

AI.tldr: 本文给出了Harish-Chandra关于p-adic群超尖表示抛物诱导不可约性与Harish-Chandra μ函数解析行为之间联系结果的完整证明，并证明该证明在中心扩张情形下仍然有效。
AI.motivation: Harish-Chandra的结果连接了p-adic群超尖表示的抛物诱导不可约性与Harish-Chandra μ函数的解析行为，但需要完整证明并扩展到中心扩张情形。
AI.method: 提供Harish-Chandra原始结果的完整证明，并验证证明方法在中心扩张情形下的有效性。
AI.result: 成功给出了Harish-Chandra结果的完整证明，并证明该证明在中心扩张情形下仍然成立。
AI.conclusion: Harish-Chandra关于抛物诱导不可约性与μ函数解析行为联系的结果得到了完整证明，且该证明框架适用于更一般的中心扩张情形。

title: Classification of exact structures using the Ziegler spectrum
comment: 24 pages, this overlaps with my (unpublished) habilitation thesis
summary: Given an idempotent complete additive category, we show the there is an explicitly constructed topological space such that the lattice of exact substructures is anti-isomorphic to the lattice of closed subsets. In the special case that the additive category has weak cokernels, this topological space is an open subset of the Ziegler spectrum and this is a result of Kevin Schlegel. We also look at some module categories of rings where the Ziegler spectrum is known and calculate the global dimensions of the corresponding exact substructures. Second version contains minor changes to first version.

AI.tldr: 论文构建了一个拓扑空间，使得加法范畴的精确子结构格与闭子集格反同构，扩展了Kevin Schlegel在具有弱余核范畴中的结果，并计算了某些环模范畴中相应精确子结构的整体维数。
AI.motivation: 研究幂等完备加法范畴中精确子结构与拓扑空间闭子集之间的对应关系，推广Kevin Schlegel关于具有弱余核范畴的结果，并探索在具体模范畴中的应用。
AI.method: 为幂等完备加法范畴显式构造一个拓扑空间，证明其精确子结构格与闭子集格反同构；在具有弱余核的特殊情况下，该空间是Ziegler谱的开子集；在已知Ziegler谱的环模范畴中计算相应精确子结构的整体维数。
AI.result: 成功构建了拓扑空间并建立了精确子结构格与闭子集格的反同构关系；在特殊情况下验证了该空间是Ziegler谱的开子集；计算了具体模范畴中精确子结构的整体维数。
AI.conclusion: 论文建立了幂等完备加法范畴中精确子结构与拓扑空间闭子集之间的对应关系，推广了Schlegel的结果，并为具体模范畴提供了计算精确子结构整体维数的方法。

title: Geometry of regular semisimple Lusztig varieties
comment: 40 pages. Revised version, including a new result on Weyl group symmetry of weight multiplicities (Corollary 1.12)
summary:
Lusztig varieties are subvarieties in flag manifolds $G/B$ associated to an element $w$ in the Weyl group $W$ and an element $x$ in $G$, introduced in Lusztig's papers on character sheaves. We study the geometry of these varieties when $x$ is regular semisimple.
  In the first part, we establish that they are normal, Cohen-Macaulay, of pure expected dimension and have rational singularities. We then show that the cohomology of ample line bundles vanishes in positive degrees, in arbitrary characteristic. This extends to nef line bundles when the base field has characteristic zero or sufficiently large characteristic. Along the way, we prove that Lusztig varieties are Frobenius split in positive characteristic and that their open cells are affine. We also prove that the open cells in Deligne-Lusztig varieties are affine, settling a question that has been open since the foundational paper of Deligne and Lusztig.
  In the second part, we explore their relationship with regular semisimple Hessenberg varieties. Both varieties admit Tymoczko's dot action of $W$ on their (intersection) cohomology. We associate to each element $w$ in $W$ a Hessenberg space using the tangent cone of the Schubert variety associated with $w$, and show that the cohomology of the associated regular semisimple Lusztig varieties and Hessenberg varieties is isomorphic as graded $W$-representations when they are smooth.
  This relationship extends to the level of varieties: we construct a flat degeneration of regular semisimple Lusztig varieties to regular semisimple Hessenberg varieties. In particular, this proves a conjecture of Abreu and Nigro on the homeomorphism types of regular semisimple Lusztig varieties in type $A$, and generalizes it to arbitrary Lie types.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Lusztig簇在正则半单元素情况下的几何性质，证明了其正规性、Cohen-Macaulay性、有理奇异性等性质，并建立了与正则半单Hessenberg簇的深刻联系。
AI.motivation: Lusztig簇是Lusztig在特征层研究中引入的旗流形子簇，但对其几何性质特别是当元素x为正则半单时的系统研究尚不充分。本文旨在深入探索这类簇的几何结构及其与Hessenberg簇的关系。
AI.method: 第一部分采用代数几何方法研究Lusztig簇的几何性质，包括证明其正规性、Cohen-Macaulay性、有理奇异性，以及Frobenius分裂性。第二部分通过构造平坦退化，建立Lusztig簇与Hessenberg簇的深刻联系，并研究它们的上同调表示。
AI.result: 证明了正则半单Lusztig簇是正规、Cohen-Macaulay、具有有理奇异性的纯维簇；其开胞腔是仿射的；在正特征下是Frobenius分裂的；建立了与正则半单Hessenberg簇的平坦退化关系；证明了Abreu和Nigro猜想并推广到任意李类型。
AI.conclusion: 正则半单Lusztig簇具有丰富的几何性质，且与正则半单Hessenberg簇存在深刻的对应关系，这不仅解决了长期未决的问题，也为进一步研究这两类簇的几何与表示理论提供了新视角。

title: Gelfand-Fuks cohomology of vector fields on algebraic varieties
summary: For an affine algebraic variety, we introduce algebraic Gelfand-Fuks cohomology of polynomial vector fields with coefficients in differentiable $AV$-modules. Its complex is given by cochains that are differential operators in the sense of Grothendieck. Using the jets of vector fields, we compute this cohomology for varieties with uniformizing parameters. We prove that in this case, Gelfand-Fuks cohomology with coefficients in a tensor module decomposes as a tensor product of the de Rham cohomology of the variety and the cohomology of the Lie algebra of vector fields on affine space, vanishing at the origin. We explicitly compute this cohomology for affine space, the torus, and Krichever-Novikov algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文为仿射代数簇引入了多项式向量场的代数Gelfand-Fuks上同调，系数为可微AV-模，使用Grothendieck意义下的微分算子作为上链，通过向量场的jet计算具有均匀化参数的簇的上同调。
AI.motivation: 研究仿射代数簇上多项式向量场的代数Gelfand-Fuks上同调理论，建立与de Rham上同调的联系，为代数几何中的向量场理论提供新的同调工具。
AI.method: 引入Grothendieck意义下的微分算子作为上链，利用向量场的jet技术，计算具有均匀化参数的簇的上同调，证明张量模系数的Gelfand-Fuks上同调可分解为簇的de Rham上同调与仿射空间向量场李代数上同调的张量积。
AI.result: 成功计算了仿射空间、环面和Krichever-Novikov代数的Gelfand-Fuks上同调，建立了明确的分解公式，为这些重要代数结构的同调性质提供了新的描述。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了仿射代数簇的代数Gelfand-Fuks上同调理论，建立了与经典de Rham上同调的联系，为代数几何和表示论中的向量场研究提供了新的同调框架和计算方法。

title: The center of the asymptotic Hecke category and unipotent character sheaves
comment: V3: Final version to appear in Represent. Theory. We thank the anonymous referees for their many helpful comments which greatly improved the paper
summary:
In 2015, Lusztig [Bull. Inst. Math. Acad. Sin. (N.S.)10(2015), no.1, 1-72] showed that for a connected reductive group over an algebraic closure of a finite field the associated (geometric) Hecke category admits a truncation in a two-sided Kazhdan--Lusztig cell, making it a categorification of the asymptotic algebra (J-ring), and that the categorical center of this "asymptotic Hecke category" is equivalent to the category of unipotent character sheaves supported in the cell. Subsequently, Lusztig noted that an asymptotic Hecke category can be constructed for any finite Coxeter group using Soergel bimodules. Lusztig conjectured that the centers of these categories are modular tensor categories (which was then proven by Elias and Williamson) and that for non-crystallographic finite Coxeter groups the S-matrices coincide with the Fourier matrices that were constructed in the 1990s by Lusztig, Malle, and Broué--Malle. If the conjecture is true, the centers may be considered as categories of "unipotent character sheaves" for non-crystallographic finite Coxeter groups.
  In this paper, we show that the conjecture is true for dihedral groups and for some (we cannot resolve all) cells of H3 and H4. The key ingredient is the method of H-reduction and the identification of the (reduced) asymptotic Hecke category with known categories whose center is already known as well. We conclude by studying the asymptotic Hecke category and its center for some infinite Coxeter groups with a finite cell.

AI.tldr: 该论文验证了Lusztig关于非晶体有限Coxeter群渐近Hecke范畴中心与Fourier矩阵匹配的猜想，在二面体群和部分H3、H4胞中成立。
AI.motivation: Lusztig提出猜想：对于非晶体有限Coxeter群，渐近Hecke范畴的中心是模张量范畴，其S矩阵与1990年代Lusztig、Malle、Broué-Malle构造的Fourier矩阵一致。该论文旨在验证这一猜想。
AI.method: 采用H-约化方法，将约化后的渐近Hecke范畴与已知范畴进行识别，这些已知范畴的中心性质已经明确。通过这种方法处理二面体群和部分H3、H4胞的情况。
AI.result: 证明了Lusztig猜想在二面体群中完全成立，在部分H3和H4胞中也成立（但未能解决所有胞的情况）。
AI.conclusion: 渐近Hecke范畴的中心可视为非晶体有限Coxeter群的"单幂特征层"范畴，论文还研究了具有有限胞的无限Coxeter群的相应结构。

title: A universal sheaf of algebras governing representations of vector fields on quasi-projective varieties
comment: In this revised version, we fixed a technical error related to completed tensor products
summary: We construct a quasi-coherent sheaf of associative algebras which controls a category of $AV$-modules over a smooth quasi-projective variety. We establish a local structure theorem, proving that in étale charts these associative algebras decompose into a tensor product of the algebra of differential operators and the universal enveloping algebra of the Lie algebra of power series vector fields vanishing at the origin.

AI.tldr: 构建了一个拟凝聚代数层来控制光滑拟射影簇上的AV-模范畴，并证明了局部结构定理
AI.motivation: 研究光滑拟射影簇上AV-模范畴的代数控制结构，理解其局部分解性质
AI.method: 构造拟凝聚的关联代数层，在étale图表中证明代数分解为微分算子代数与幂级数向量场李代数的泛包络代数的张量积
AI.result: 建立了局部结构定理，证明了在étale图表中代数分解为微分算子代数与幂级数向量场李代数的泛包络代数的张量积
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了控制AV-模范畴的代数层，并揭示了其局部分解结构，为研究光滑拟射影簇上的模范畴提供了代数工具

title: Conjectures on the reduced Kronecker coefficients
comment: 12 pages. The main Conjecture 5.1 is false and we add counterexamples found by professor Mike Zabrocki in the end
summary: We formulate a series of conjectures on the stable tensor product of irreducible representations of symmetric groups, which are closely related to the reduced Kronecker coefficients. These conjectures are certain generalizations of Okounkov's conjecture on the log-concavity of the Littlewood--Richardson coefficients and the Schur log-concavity theorem of Lam--Postnikov--Pylyavskyy. We prove our conjectures in some special cases and discuss some implications of these conjectures.

AI.tldr: 本文提出关于对称群不可约表示稳定张量积的一系列猜想，这些猜想与约化Kronecker系数密切相关，是Okounkov关于Littlewood-Richardson系数对数凹性猜想以及Lam-Postnikov-Pylyavskyy的Schur对数凹性定理的推广。
AI.motivation: 研究对称群表示论中的稳定张量积问题，特别是与约化Kronecker系数相关的对数凹性性质。这些猜想旨在推广已知的对数凹性结果，深化对对称群表示组合结构的理解。
AI.method: 通过提出一系列关于对称群不可约表示稳定张量积的猜想，这些猜想与约化Kronecker系数紧密相关。作者在特殊情况下证明了这些猜想，并讨论了它们的数学含义。
AI.result: 在特殊情况下证明了提出的猜想，并探讨了这些猜想在表示论和组合数学中的潜在应用和意义。
AI.conclusion: 提出的猜想为对称群表示论中的稳定张量积问题提供了新的研究方向，是对现有对数凹性结果的推广，有望进一步揭示对称群表示的深层组合结构。
